meaning: astray, be perplexed, in doubt, lost, err, illusion

onyomiExamples.meaning: trouble, bother, annoyance, nuisance, inconvenience, to be troubled (by), to be bothered (by), to be inconvenienced (by)
straying from love, falling out of love, lost love

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to lose one's way, to get lost, to waver, to hesitate, to be of two minds over, to be puzzled, to be perplexed, to give into temptation, to lose control of oneself, to be charmed, to be infatuated, to be captivated, to be smitten, to turn in one's grave
